title: Built public assignment tracker + hosting pipeline
summary: Created static dashboard (summary cards, filters, task log), seeded initial data, and wired GitHub Pages deployment.
result: Site deployed — waiting on first GitHub Pages build to propagate (~2 min).
followUp: Log each future assignment + ping Austin once Pages build finishes.

title: Published refreshed 2008 Mercedes-Benz S550 listing
summary: Rebuilt copy, resized eight dealer photos, and submitted the listing to Facebook Marketplace + Cars And Trucks For Sale By Owner group.
result: Listing submitted and currently in Facebook review queue.
followUp: Confirm approval notification, then distribute live link to secondary marketplaces.

title: Contacted five qualifying Nissan Altima sellers
summary: Applied ≤$10K / ≤100K mi / ≥2018 filter and messaged five high-potential listings with custom cash offers and availability questions.
result: Waiting on seller replies; inbox monitoring enabled.
followUp: Surface any responsive sellers + coordinate inspections over the weekend.
